job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongemPosition at Glidewell DentalbrbremGlidewell Dental is an industryleading provider of dental technology products and services to dental professionals worldwide Headquartered in Newport BeachIrvine CA the Glidewell campus is home to 3300 employees and complete with an employee gym cafeteria massage therapist acupuncturist and of course a dentist Glidewell Dental employs over 5000 employees worldwide and is privately ownedbrbrSo what is a dental company doing with technologybrbrGlidewell is dedicated to building the future of dental through additive manufacturing data science and even machine learning We research and develop new innovative products and services for the dental industry at affordable costs Just ask your dentistbrbrstronguAs a Observability Engineer You WillbrustrongulliDevelops enterprisewide instrumentation strategy to support real time observability health checks and remediationsliliContinuously right metrics and debugs issues to better understand how to improve and automate tool visibility usability and enables them to quickly set up instrumentationliliOwns APM tools and works to ensure it is setup properly to monitor metrics traces and logsliliConducts presentations and trains engineers on observability tool usageliliServes as subject matter expert on ObservabilityliliOwns monitoring logging and alertingliliProvides advanced troubleshooting skills to resolve technical problemsliliProvides daytoday support of production critical applicationsliliWrites clear concise code in accordance with the Companys development standards and best practices when applicable or necessaryliliCreates heartbeats endtoend integration tests to ensure applications function according to expand the monitoring environment to develop a specific early warning monitoring environmentliliDevelops operational dashboards and reviews reports tracking key performance indicators KPIs and trends development patching and updating of released products through use of Agile processliliPerforms other related duties and projects as business needs require at direction of
